name: Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted
description:
Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted is a souls-like game with Enrage mechanic which sets in a Nature themed dark fantasy world. Fight your way from the deepest dungeons to the top of the clouds and save the corrupted nature in this mysterious "pre-human" era-themed epic story.



You will play as Elrih The God of Air. Walk within the footsteps with him to experience the journey he goes through to claim his throne.

LORE


Long time ago, on a planet made of dust, with no plants or trees, lived Primogenitus (first people). Then came the clouds and the rain, lakes and seas came into existence; saplings of The World Tree started to grow inside The Heart Of The Earth.
Gûl wanted to decimate the World tree while Elrih wanted it to preseve it. Therefore, a war broke out between Gûl and Elrih.
As a consequence of this age-old war, the Primogenitus fell out of power and evolved into today’s humans. Gûl became the one who was defeated and captivated under The World Tree.
After thousands of years, a malignant cult of humans goes to The World Tree, breaks the seal that holds Gûl captive and Gûl becomes free.

COMBAT

Powerful Foes & Epic Boss Scenes
Defeat the ones who obey the corrupted world of Ex Natura. Clear them all by using your power of straight and magic.

SKILLTREE

Choose your own path
Evolve with powerful new skills and abilities and defeat your enemies in a way that adapts to your style of play.

GATHER & CRAFT

You have to be prepared for battle
Summon your magic and stir the right herbs into a powerful potion.

EXPLORE & SOLVE PUZZLES

Cruel World of Ex Natura is waiting for you to discover
Use your wisdom to solve puzzles and explore the world with your curiosity.

Highlights / Features


  • More than 16+ defeatable foes
  • Progressive difficulty and character progression system
  • A variety of biomes for players to explore
  • Epic bosses with their unique fighting
  • Numerous Unlockable skins
  • Mysterious puzzles, engaging platforming elements, and a fast responsive combat system.
  • Rich Story
